title: Goldman's Most Notorious Banker Turns Star Witness
itunes:title: Goldman's Most Notorious Banker Turns Star Witness
description:
Michael Weinstein, chair of the white collar criminal practice at Cole Schotz, discusses the testimony of former Goldman Sachs banker Tim Leissner, in the trial of his former subordinate Roger Ng in the 1MDB scandal.

Roy Strom, a reporter with Bloomberg Law, discusses litigation funders getting into funding the wrongly convicted.

June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
